I am a versatile compositor with 11 years professional experience in film, television, broadcast and commercials.

Software: Nuke, Katana, Digital Fusion, After Effects, Silhouette and Roto, Photoshop, Illustrator, Shake, Mocha Pro and Maya

Specialties: Compositing, complicated scene reconstruction or retouching, digital paint, keying difficult screens, look development, stereo compositing/conversion, lighting.
